* APAP (Acetaminophen) is a drug used to treat pain and fever, and it is also a disease entity in this context because it is being analyzed for its disposition in the body.
* Acetylated metabolites refer to the metabolic products of Acetaminophen, which are also disease entities in this context because they are being analyzed for their disposition in the body.
